title: Question 25
prompt:
Sentence 13: Each employee will have an opportunity to voice their comments and questions on this topic.

Which is the best way to write the underlined portion of this sentence? If the original is the best way, choose option (A).
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The plural possessive pronoun their refers to the word employee, which is a singular noun. The possessive pronoun should be singular, not plural. The construction his or her is used because everyone refers to both male and female attendees.
Each employee will have an opportunity to voice his or her comments and questions on this topic.
